## GerstnerWaveGenerator.getWaveDirection() method

Gets the angle of the wave direction in radians.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getWaveDirection(waveIndex: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to get. |

**Returns:**

number

Angle of the wave direction in radians.
